SQL.LOAD: SELECT invoice_number, invoice_date, invoice_amount, term_xcd, paid_amount, payment_status_xcd, source, vendor_id, vendor_address_id, ship_to_address_id, currency_iso_code, exchange_rate, approved_xcd, accounting_period, distributed, posted, dealer_id, company_id, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, ap_invoice_header_id FROM elp_ap_invoice_header WHERE ap_invoice_header_id = :ap_invoice_header_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_ap_invoice_header SET invoice_number = :invoice_number, invoice_date = :invoice_date, invoice_amount = :invoice_amount, term_xcd = :term_xcd, paid_amount = :paid_amount, payment_status_xcd = :payment_status_xcd, source = :source, vendor_id = :vendor_id, vendor_address_id = :vendor_address_id, ship_to_address_id = :ship_to_address_id, currency_iso_code = :currency_iso_code, exchange_rate = :exchange_rate, approved_xcd = :approved_xcd, accounting_period = :accounting_period, distributed = :distributed, posted = :posted, dealer_id = :dealer_id, company_id = :company_id, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE ap_invoice_header_id = :ap_invoice_header_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_ap_invoice_header ( invoice_number, invoice_date, invoice_amount, term_xcd, paid_amount, payment_status_xcd, source, vendor_id, vendor_address_id, ship_to_address_id, currency_iso_code, exchange_rate, approved_xcd, accounting_period, distributed, posted, dealer_id, company_id, created_by, ap_invoice_header_id ) VALUES ( :invoice_number, :invoice_date, :invoice_amount, :term_xcd, :paid_amount, :payment_status_xcd, :source, :vendor_id, :vendor_address_id, :ship_to_address_id, :currency_iso_code, :exchange_rate, :approved_xcd, :accounting_period, :distributed, :posted, :dealer_id, :company_id, :created_by, :ap_invoice_header_id )
